name: Walled Horror
movement: immobile except for movement through walls
description: The Walled Horror is a large undead creature known for its chaotic appearance and the ability to move through walls, embodying malevolence and chaos.
memorable: Its terrifying ability to make surprise attacks through walls and induce fear in opponents makes it a unique and formidable adversary.
goals: To instill fear and chaos, incapacitating foes while utilizing its wall-bound uniqueness.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other undead or creatures tied to necromancy.
environment: Typically found in abandoned buildings, ruins, or areas with strong ties to spirits.
strengths: High defenses, significant damage immunities, and the ability to move through walls to surprise foes.
weaknesses: Its immobility limits movement and could be exploited by savvy opponents.
attacks: Two spectral claw attacks dealing slashing and psychic damage, with an ability to grapple targets.
most_powerful_ability: Spectral Scream, which inflicts significant psychic damage and can frighten targets.
senses: Has truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to see beyond the ordinary.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.
Can only move within 120 feet of its bound wall.
Can repair its wall-bound form by resting.
Partially entombs creatures, rendering them blinded and restrained.
Can inflict grave fear with its psychic abilities.
test_queries: large monster that moves through walls
chaotic evil undead that frightens enemies
immobile horror that deals psychic damage
